name: pluginmarket
description: GeekTools Plugin Marketplace - 插件市场

scripts.db:reset: cd server && rm -f marketplace.db && sqlx migrate run
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd server && cargo build
scripts.build: pnpm run frontend:build && pnpm run backend:build
scripts.start: pnpm run build && concurrently "pnpm run frontend:serve" "pnpm run backend:dev"
